description: This file defines a React component called DeviceDetail that displays detailed information about a device, fetches device data via API calls, handles loading and error states, and includes subcomponents for query execution and result display.

classes.name: Device
classes.description: TypeScript interface defining the structure of a device object with id, name, ip, and optional metadata.

methods.name: DeviceDetail
methods.description: React functional component that renders device details, handles fetching data from API, manages loading and error states, and displays query form and results.

methods.name: fetchDevice
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch device data from API based on device id and update component state.
